item.title: 《学音标》
item.author: miaomiaoyangyxy@gmail.com (MiaoMiaoYang)
item.description: 前言 从古至今，上下五千年，MiaoMiaoYang还从来没有学过音标，现在正式开始从头直面自己惨淡的人生，啾咪 [DOGE] 名称音 Vs 发音 名称音：字母在字
item.dc:creator: MiaoMiaoYang

item.title: TOEFL-听力
item.author: miaomiaoyangyxy@gmail.com (MiaoMiaoYang)
item.description: 现在感觉最大的问题不是单词不认识，是放到语境中就听不出来，语速太快记不住多少东西 先从听懂开始，默写听力材料 细节题 细节题和主旨有关，但不是所有
item.dc:creator: MiaoMiaoYang

item.title: WordsList-词根

item.description: -press words explanation audio remark depress vt. 抑制；降低；削弱；使沮丧；使萧条 Your browser does not support the audio element The rainy days always depress me. Some will depress excitatory neurons and some will enhance inhibitory neurons. repress vt. 镇压；克制 Your browser does not support the audio element -ception perception exception -trud intrude extrude detrude
